page.title: 10Port Isaac Continue.
page.content: Men on the Lifeboat have to wear a rubber suit which goes from their feet to their neck,and they wear a jacket and cap to protect them.Once John and two others had to go to the bottom of the cliff and rescue a doctor who had fallen over and broken his back his two legs and one of his wrists. Instead of him being in a wheelchair for the rest of his life,he was walking again. The Lifeboat would be at the bottom of the cliff if one of the cliff rescue team happened to fall. If the Lifeboat was needed two rocket maroons would be fired everybody in the Lifeboat should run down to the Lifeboat house. The first three there get there suits on and go on the rescue .Then we go as fast as we can on the rescue.
